name: JuspaySafeBrowser
summary: JusPay Safe Browser (codename: Godel) aims to reduce friction in Second Factor Authentication for Cards and Netbanking
description:
The library provides various convenience and security features for users to be able to complete the transaction quickly. 
The library also provides much deeper insight into the events occurring in the payment flow. 
With Godel, you will be able to provide a pleasing payments experience to your iOS users.
